message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You wanted 60-40, I'll give you 55-45, a compromise!
You're getting closer, but I want a bit more. How about 42-58?
I'll give you 42% and I'll take 58%, a fair split?
I'll take 41% and you can have 59%. It's a fair compromise, don't you think?
